Keywords: Fantastic Four , Illuminati , Scientist
Real Name: Reed Richards
Special Powers
REFORMING THE FANTASTIC FOUR: Once per attack, you may force the attacker to reroll a 4 in an attack roll targeting Mr. Fantastic.
ELASTIC FINGER SQUEEZE: Plasticity. Giant Reach: 4. When Mr. Fantastic hits with a close attack and has not been moved or placed this turn, until your next turn a hit character modifies attack -1 and considers Mr. Fantastic adjacent for the purpose of breaking away.

Goop
Lack of move/attack definitely hurts him but having outwit more than makes up for it for just 50pts. He's a good attacker but make sure you got some tk or another way to get him around.
